name: collisionBehavior(_:beganContactFor:withBoundaryIdentifier:at:)
desc: Called when a collision, between a dynamic item and a collision boundary, has begun.
declaration:
optional func collisionBehavior(_ behavior: UICollisionBehavior, 
                beganContactFor item: UIDynamicItem, 
         withBoundaryIdentifier identifier: NSCopying?, 
                             at p: CGPoint)
